title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Distance Learning
body: Distance Learning       How would you like to bring OUR park into YOUR Classroom? We are doing Skype sessions from our park.  These sessions fit into 1 class period and can be customized to fit your lesson plans. If you are interested and would like more information on setting this up please call the Education/Group Tour Coordinator at 973-736-0550 ext 33.        Results  There are no results to show.
